author: leobeltra
body:
#### PR description:

This PR merges `SoAView.h` into `SoALayout.h`, making the `View` a sole subclass of the `Layout`. The tests that previously used the `GENERATE_SOA_VIEW` macro have been updated to utilize the `View` constructor by columns, introduced in [#47306](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47306). Additionally, a heterogeneous `deepCopy` method has been added to both `PortableHostCollection` and `PortableDeviceCollection`, allowing users to copy data from potentially different memory buffers across various devices, and consolidating the columns into a single contiguous memory buffer. This new feature leverages the `Descriptor` and `ConstDescriptor` structs, also introduced in this PR within `SoALayout.h`, which provide an interface to iterate over the SoA columns without relying on their names. This approach was implemented to keep the SoA backend independent from alpaka.

#### PR validation:

The added unit test passes.
title: Merged SoAView into SoALayout and added heterogeneous deepCopy for PortableCollections
